sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input, NgModule } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../../modal/product.mode'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home-card', templateUrl: './home-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home-card.component.css'] }) export class HomeCardComponent { imagePath: string = "\\images\\product\\" @Input() public productCard: Product = { id: 0, name: "", shortDes: "", description: "", price: 0, image: "", categoryId: 0, applicationTypeId: 0, tempCount: 0 } }
{{productCard.name}}
{{imagePath + productCard.image}}
Price: {{productCard.price}}
{{productCard.categoryId}}
{{productCard.applicationTypeId}}
{{productCard.shortDes}}
